ul.li: The latest release of Commons SCXML is version 0.8.
If you are interested in helping the project, join us on the commons-dev mailing list.

release.action: [11-21-2008] Added clirr plugin report, cleaned up some checkstyle errors.
[11-21-2008] Support "initial" attribute of <state>.
[11-21-2008] SCXMLSerializer does not serialize custom namespace declarations.
[11-21-2008] SCXMLSerializer does not serialize custom namespace declarations.
[11-21-2008] Change "appLog" name to be derived from "SCXMLSemantics.class" rather than the arbitrary "scxml.app.log"
[11-21-2008] "event" attribute of <send> is not evaluated
[11-19-2008] Support executable content in <transition> child of <initial>
[11-19-2008] Support for <onentry> and <onexit> children for <parallel> states.
[11-18-2008] Support for <transition> children for <parallel> states.
[11-14-2008] <assign> doesn't remove all existing children from location.
[11-14-2008] SCXMLParser should throw an exception for parsing failures on bad URIs in <state>'s "src" attribute.
[11-13-2008] Delayed events not passing payload.
[11-13-2008] Added Softwaredemo to "Who is using it?"
[10-03-2008] Added a tutorial about using Commons SCXML on Google Android.
[08-01-2008] Improvements in <send> serialization.
[07-30-2008] Stop rendering non-standard "parentid" attribute during serialization.
[07-28-2008] Update datamodel section of the guide to stress namespace awareness of document.
[07-28-2008] <var> and <exit> should be serialized in the Commons SCXML namespace.
[07-28-2008] SCXMLListeners will not processed in defined order.
[07-28-2008] Correct semantics for <param> with only the "name" attribute specified.
[07-28-2008] Serialization of expressions may produce invalid XML.
[07-11-2008] Make TriggerEvent class Serializable.
[07-11-2008] <data> should support the "id" attribute.
[06-17-2008] The "delay" attribute of the <send> element should be a value expression.
[06-17-2008] Support the "initial" attribute of the <scxml> element, added in the 4th Working Draft.
[05-03-2008] Better error reporting for ignored or misplaced elements by parser (SCXMLParser class).
[04-25-2008] Enhancement request for supporting fragment URLs in <state> element's src attribute.
[02-09-2008] Process <parallel> child of <state> correctly.
[01-26-2008] Improve first-hit performance for following transitions by working out the paths at parse-time.
[01-03-2008] Clarify via Javadocs that the SCXMLParser assumes the input to be a well-formed and correct SCXML document.
[01-03-2008] Added tests for SCXML-64.
[01-03-2008] Add the issues test package for tracking tests tied to the Commons issue tracker.
[01-03-2008] Improve serialization of <transition> elements.
[01-03-2008] Add assertPostTriggerState() methods to SCXMLTestHelper.
[12-20-2007] Minor site updates: add a prominent download link, and update a few remaining Jakarta references.
[12-12-2007] Add experimental Maven2 pom.xml to source distro.
[12-12-2007] Update JUnit dependency version to 3.8.2.
[12-08-2007] AbstractStateMachine and SimpleSCXMLListener classes switched to the new SCXMLParser.
[12-06-2007] Recommended version of Commons Logging has been upgraded to v1.1.1.
[12-06-2007] Wild card event name handling on transitions made in line with WD.
[12-04-2007] Clarify via class Javadoc interaction model between Invokers and parent executor.
[12-04-2007] Add support for the <event> tag.
[12-04-2007] Object model not stateless due to State class. Store the completion status for composite states along with other instance information in the executor.
[12-04-2007] Deprecate SCXMLDigester class in favor of the new SCXMLParser class. The new class supports newer Working Drafts and has better naming.
[12-03-2007] Fix possible race condition in AsyncTrigger class.
[12-03-2007] Events from custom actions missing payload. Also fix test classes to safely create contexts.
[12-03-2007] Skip serialization tests if necessary directory cannot be created.
[11-30-2007] Support nested invokes when using SimpleSCXMLInvoker class.
[11-16-2007] Update Maven 2 build to include source and binary assemblies and site resources.
[08-20-2007] Apply per region document order filter for transition conflict resolution. See SCXML-52 for part of discussion.
[08-06-2007] SimpleSCXMLInvoker may miss transition to final state.
[08-01-2007] Fix conflict resolution for conditionless stay transitions. class.
[07-30-2007] Various changes related to the Commons TLP move.
[07-27-2007] Delete existing child nodes before adding new ones when using <assign> to supply new values to <data> nodes.
[06-26-2007] Fixed subclassing behavior for AbstractStateMachine class.
[06-15-2007] Better names for getter and setter of the boolean property State#isFinal. Previous names deprecated.
[06-15-2007] Added a SCXMLListener abstract adapter class.
[06-15-2007] Added information about failing expression to evaluation error messages.
[06-14-2007] Remove KEYS file, in favor of one file for all of Commons.

[05-29-2007] Payload of events sent to current scxml session using <send> tag are now injected into engine. Commons SCXML adds the special _eventdatamap variable for storing payloads for derived events.
[04-25-2007] Replace deprecated API usage, with current ones.
[04-25-2007] The test package switched to using SCXMLParser class.
[04-25-2007] Added support for <final> to SCXMLParser class.
[04-25-2007] Add a Commons SCXML namespace to support implementation specific actions. Moved <var> and <exit> actions to this implementation specific namespace.
[03-24-2007] New set of tests matching vocabulary in latest Working Draft, for testing the new SCXMLParser class.
[03-24-2007] Deprecate various method in the model package (primarily SCXML, State and Parallel classes) based on changes brought on by the latest WDs.
[03-22-2007] Add new parser (org.apache.commons.scxml.io.SCXMLParser) to support latest WD and improve naming.
[03-12-2007] The regions of a parallel are entered in document order. This is implementation-specific behavior and users should not rely on it.
[03-12-2007] Added tests for conflict resolution based on document order and for multiple transition targets.
[03-12-2007] Deprecated various methods in Transition class that refer to a singular target.
[03-12-2007] Implement ability to support multiple transition targets (space separated list of state IDs). IDs must no longer contain whitespace.
[03-12-2007] Better handling of parent-child relationships (part 1).
[03-12-2007] Deprecated State#getTransitions() in favor of State#getTransitionsList().
[03-09-2007] Implement document order priority for transitions.
[12-18-2006] SCXMLExecutor#logState() now uses debug level to reduce noise at console.
[12-12-2006] target and targettype attributes of <send> element are now evaluated as expressions.
[12-12-2006] Set tests to warn, but not fail, if the DOM L2 implementation in use is not serializable.
[12-07-2006] Update Commons Logging to version 1.1.
[12-07-2006] Update Commons JEXL to version 1.1.
[12-07-2006] Improved processing of namespace prefixes in deferred evaluation of XPath expressions.
[12-06-2006] Update Commons Digester to version 1.8.
[11-22-2006] Logging for <var> and <assign>.
[11-08-2006] Add project DOAP file.
[11-07-2006] Add a test case to demonstrate adding a custom action with the same local name as one of the standard SCXML actions (but a different namespace).
[11-04-2006] Add tests to ensure white box behavior of the <state> element's src attribute.
[10-23-2006] Up to date versions for the usecases blurbs for the website. Update image on site front page.
[10-17-2006] Added serial version UIDs.
[10-17-2006] New EventDispatcher implementation (SimpleScheduler) that provides the ability to deal with delayed events for the "scxml" <send> targettype.
[10-11-2006] Some thread-safety improvements for SCXMLExecutor instances.
[10-11-2006] Update to new ASLv2 license headers for source files.
[10-05-2006] The Commons SCXML object model as well as the SCXMLExecutor instances are now serializable.
[10-02-2006] Deprecate ErrorReporter fields, add ErrorConstants class for default Commons SCXML semantics.
[09-29-2006] Begin the deprecation process for custom digester rules in the io package.
[09-21-2006] SCXML elements have to be defined in the following namespace (case sensitive): http://www.w3.org/2005/07/scxml
[08-07-2006] Allow the target of a transition to be omitted.
[07-28-2006] Updated website to reflect 0.5 release.
[07-19-2006] SCXML doesn't compile using (Sun) JDK 1.5. actions.
[07-19-2006] Add src attribute processing for assign tag.
[06-19-2006] Added invoke, param and finalize processing. These SCXML elements were added in the January 2006 Working Draft.
[05-17-2006] Reflect use of JIRA as the issue tracker for Commons SCXML. Bugzilla should no longer be used.
[05-17-2006] Added examples of shallow and deep history.
[05-17-2006] External document digester now processes custom actions.
[05-04-2006] Added section on custom semantics to user guide.
[05-04-2006] Added explicit Instructions on core-engine.html from user guide.
[05-04-2006] Added datamodel explanation and examples to user guide.
[05-04-2006] Added documentation blurb on common interaction patterns using the Commons SCXML library (the "glue" or "bridge" code).
[04-24-2006] Commons SCXML has graduated from Commons Sandbox, updated repository to reflect move to Commons Proper.
[04-20-2006] Added documentation on "_eventdata" and method invocation in expression languages used.
[04-20-2006] Allow SCXML documents using EL to define arbitrary EL functions by providing a FunctionMapper to the ELEvaluator.
[04-20-2006] Provide access to SCXMLExecutor's root context.
[04-03-2006] Added support for the wildcard (*) event.
[04-03-2006] Added _eventdata support. The payload of a triggered event is available under the special variable named _eventdata.
[03-28-2006] Unnamed trigger events are now correctly processed (they do not match any event name).
[03-23-2006] Initial cut at supporting the datamodel section from the January 06 Working Draft.
[03-06-2006] Added a FAQ page for the Commons SCXML website. Added a section on SCXML Contexts and Evaluators (plugging in an expression language) to the online "guide".
[03-03-2006] Add support for "target" attribute of "transition" element per the latest (Jan 06) WD.
[03-03-2006] Added a Maven2 POM.
[03-01-2006] A new usecase for a stand-alone application modeling a stopwatch.

[02-28-2006] AbstractStateMachine class added that demonstrates one approach for providing the base functionality needed by standalone classes representing stateful entities, whose behaviors are defined via SCXML documents.
[02-27-2006] Improve Commons SCXML website "guide". Added a section on SCXML documents, and another on custom actions.
[02-25-2006] Added easier support for custom actions. Provide a "hello world" example using a custom action.
[02-25-2006] Refactor processing of actions (they now contain an "execute" method).
[02-24-2006] Define ExternalContent interface to mark elements that may contain "body content" (in external namespaces), for example, the SCXML "send" element.
[02-22-2006] Minor Javadoc fixes and additions.
[02-09-2006] Basic test cases for SCXML document execution when using JEXL as the expression language.
[02-09-2006] JexlEvaluator was still assuming a flat context (which was changed on 02-05-2006, see change item below).
[02-05-2006] Numerous JUnit test cases added. Start publishing cobertura report.

[02-05-2006] Contexts are now created per State, but only as and when needed. The
commit message for r374981 has the details.

[02-05-2006] The Commons SCXML object model is now decoupled from the SCXML execution engine instance. The Commons SCXML object model is now stateless. For example (incomplete list):
A "SCXML" object no longer contains a root "Context"
A "State" no longer contains a "Context"
A "Transition" no longer contains a list of "SCXMLListeners" attached
A "History" no longer contains the last known configuration.
The advantage of this decoupling is that the SCXML document can be parsed once and reused across multiple execution instances, concurrently or otherwise.

[01-22-2006] Package reorganization. Mostly out of discussions on the dev list, three new packages were introduced:
A "test" package for the command line testing utility classes
An "io" package for classes related to reading and writing SCXML documents
A "servlet" environment package for the classes that depend on the servlet API for Commons SCXML usecases in servlet containers.
[01-11-2006] Various website and documentation improvements.
[01-08-2006] Improve dependencies webpage by providing URLs for each. Improve navigation by providing "quick links".
[01-08-2006] Added JEXL support for SCXML documents.
[01-07-2006] SCXML serialization bits available in a utility class.
[12-21-2005] SCXML digester instances are now available for further customization of the default digester ruleset.
[12-21-2005] The static digest() methods of the SCXMLDigester class now throw the same exceptions as the underlying ones from Digester#parse().
[12-10-2005] Make digester namespace aware, and capture arbitrary namespace children of SCXML <send> element.
[11-17-2005] Site overhaul according to recent discussions on the commons-dev mailing list.
[10-18-2005] Decouple SCXML engine from the SCXML execution semantics; make SCXML semantics pluggable.
[10-18-2005] Added UML state machine diagrams to the usecases section of the website.

[10-14-2005] Added documentation on usecases to website:
Usecase 1: To configure instances of the RDC group container.
Usecase 2: To describe Shale dialogs.

[10-14-2005] Added API notes to website:
SCXML digester
SCXML engine
Firing events on an SCXML engine
Standalone testing
Fun with EL
[10-14-2005] Updated dependency information to indicate purpose of dependency (core, test, usecases etc.).
[10-14-2005] Added Commons look and feel (navigation bar) to website.
[10-10-2005] Added second usecase for Commons SCXML (within ASF projects). Demonstrated the use of SCXML documents for describing Shale dialogs.
[10-09-2005] Add a faces package for JSF-based environments (env.faces)
[10-09-2005] Updated ant build file to include MyFaces dependency (usecases only).

[10-08-2005] Out of the box "simple" interface implementations.
Added simple loggers that implement ErrorHandler, ErrorReporter and SCXMLListener.
Added a SimpleContext that wraps a variables (name to value) Map.
[10-08-2005] VariableResolver#resolveVariable() should return null if variable is not found instead of throwing an exception (in ELEvaluator.java)
[09-29-2005] The scxml.env package has a new child jsp package, to distribute the current contents of the env package such that each supported environment can get its own package in the source.

[09-29-2005] Enhanced the Standalone testing functionality to enable:
Value change events on the current Context.
Dummy events to re-evaluate conditionals on event-less transitions.
[09-15-2005] Now handling outgoing transitions from a Parallel (Section 3.4 SCXML WD).
[09-15-2005] Minor Javadoc tweaks.
[09-15-2005] "Microwave" test samples reset timer on leaving "cooking" state so state machines can be re-run many times (without a "reset")
[09-08-2005] Updated Commons SCXML logo.

[08-27-2005] Use a customized set of checkstyle rules. These are the Sun checks with three changes as discussed on the dev list:
Use a regexp header check for ASL
Disable 'hide a field' check (lot of noise from setters)
Disable 'method design for extension' check
[08-27-2005] Six minor code changes based on FindBugs reports.
[08-25-2005] Switch to new ant build file that will work better for the Commons nightlies.
[08-24-2005] RootContext (used in the JSP environment) should override ELContext#has(String) method.
[08-24-2005] Enhanced couple of samples used by the test cases.
[08-23-2005] Added JUnit Test Framework.
[08-23-2005] Upgraded Digester version in project dependencies to 1.7.
[08-23-2005] Added BeanUtils 1.7.0 dependency as needed by Digester.
[08-20-2005] Corrected year of inception in License.
[08-20-2005] Corrected some 1500+ checkstyle errors.
[08-20-2005] This changes document added.
[08-17-2005] Initial SCXML codebase copied from the RDC Taglib codebase (part of Jakarta Taglibs Proper).
[08-17-2005] Initial build artifacts, STATUS and PROPOSAL documents.
